# Reference

Complete technical documentation for PyGraft-gen.

## Interface Documentation

<div class="grid" markdown>

- :fontawesome-solid-terminal: **[CLI Reference](cli.md)** - Command-line interface commands and options
- :fontawesome-brands-python: **[API Reference](api.md)** - Python API functions and usage

</div>

---

## File Specifications

**Configuration (Input):**

- :fontawesome-solid-sliders: **[Configuration](files/config.md)** - Main configuration file (`pygraft_config.json` or `.yml`)

**Extraction Output:**

- :fontawesome-solid-tag: **[Namespaces Info](files/namespaces-info.md)** - Namespace mappings (`namespaces_info.json`)
- :fontawesome-solid-sitemap: **[Class Info](files/class-info.md)** - Class hierarchy and constraints (`class_info.json`)
- :fontawesome-solid-link: **[Relation Info](files/relation-info.md)** - Property characteristics (`relation_info.json`)

**Generation Output:**

- :fontawesome-solid-chart-bar: **[KG Info](files/kg-info.md)** - Generation statistics (`kg_info.json`)
